DOC.brief_summary: This study is to observe the long-term treatment of BG9924
DOC.brief_title: BG9924 in Combination With Methotrexate Extension of Study 104RA203 (NCT 00458861)
DOC.criteria: Must be a participant from Study 104RA203 (NCT 00458861) Participants with a significant change in medical history from their previous BG9924 Study 104RA203 (NCT 00458861). Nursing mothers, pregnant women, or women who are planning to become pregnant while in the study. Male and female participants of childbearing potential not willing to practice effective birth control for the duration of the study. NOTE: Other protocol defined Inclusion/Exclusion criteria may apply.
